verses.text: Now \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* the \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And he \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; but not like his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and like his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: for he put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w image|strong="H4676"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* that his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 3.2 \ft image: Heb. statue\f*

Nevertheless he \w cleaved|strong="H1692"\w* unto the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, which made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*; he \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not therefrom.

¶ And \w Mesha|strong="H4338"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* was a \w sheepmaster|strong="H5349"\w*, and \w rendered|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, with the \w wool|strong="H6785"\w*.

But it came to pass, when \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4194"\w*, that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* the same \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* hath \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* against me: wilt thou \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with me against \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: I \add am\add* as thou \add art\add*, my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add and\add* my \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* as thy \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Which \w way|strong="H1870"\w* shall we go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* through the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.

So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*: and they fetched a \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* of \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days’|strong="H3117"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*: and there was no \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, and for the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* that \w followed|strong="H7272"\w* them.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft that…: Heb. at their feet\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*! that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w together|strong="H7121"\w*, to \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*!

But \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is there\add* not here a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that we may \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* by him? And \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel’s|strong="H3478"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Here \add is\add* \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w*, which \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* on the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*.

And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* with him. So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to him.

And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, What have I to do with thee? \w get|strong="H3212"\w* thee to the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and to the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Nay: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w together|strong="H7121"\w*, to \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* whom I \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, surely, were it not \w that|strong="H3884"\w* I \w regard|strong="H5375"\w* the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, I would not \w look|strong="H5027"\w* toward thee, nor \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thee.

But now \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* me a \w minstrel|strong="H5059"\w*. And it came to pass, when the \w minstrel|strong="H5059"\w* \w played|strong="H5059"\w*, that the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came upon him.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* this \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* full of \w ditches|strong="H1356"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Ye shall not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, neither shall ye \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*; yet that \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, that ye may \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, both ye, and your \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, and your \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*.

And this is \add but\add* a light \w thing|strong="H7043"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: he will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* also into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And ye shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* every \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and every \w choice|strong="H4004"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and shall \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* every \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w stop|strong="H5640"\w* all \w wells|strong="H4599"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w mar|strong="H3510"\w* every \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w piece|strong="H2513"\w* of land with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft mar: Heb. grieve\f*

And it came to pass in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, when the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* was \w offered|strong="H5927"\w*, that, behold, there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* was \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

¶ And when all the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* were come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against them, they \w gathered|strong="H6817"\w* all that were able to \w put|strong="H2296"\w* on \w armour|strong="H2290"\w*, and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.\f + \fr 3.21 \ft gathered: Heb. were cried together\f*\f + \fr 3.21 \ft put on…: Heb. gird himself with a girdle\f*

And they rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w shone|strong="H2224"\w* upon the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5048"\w* \add as\add* \w red|strong="H0122"\w* as \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*:

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* are \w surely|strong="H2717"\w* \w slain|strong="H2717"\w*, and they have \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*: now therefore, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, to the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*.\f + \fr 3.23 \ft slain: Heb. destroyed\f*

And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*, so that they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them: but they went \w forward|strong="H5221"\w* \w smiting|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*, even in \add their\add* country.\f + \fr 3.24 \ft they went…: or, they smote in it even smiting\f*

And they beat \w down|strong="H2040"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and on every \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w piece|strong="H2513"\w* of land \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* it; and they \w stopped|strong="H5640"\w* all the \w wells|strong="H4599"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w felled|strong="H5307"\w* all the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*: only in \w Kir-haraseth|strong="H7025"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* they the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* thereof; howbeit the \w slingers|strong="H7051"\w* went \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \add it\add*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* it.\f + \fr 3.25 \ft only in…: Heb. until he left its stones in Kir-haraseth\f*

¶ And when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* was too \w sore|strong="H2388"\w* for him, he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* with him \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*, to break \w through|strong="H1234"\w* \add even\add* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*: but they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not.

Then he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* his \w eldest|strong="H1060"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* that should have \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* him \add for\add* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*. And there was \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w indignation|strong="H7110"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and they \w departed|strong="H5265"\w* from him, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \add their own\add* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
